title: (Wed Early Bird) Find Out Who The Employee Of The Month Is + Amy's New Activity Lunchbox Is Confused About + Mailbag: Listener Wants To Leave Her Job But Their Friend Is The Boss
itunes:title: (Wed Early Bird) Find Out Who The Employee Of The Month Is + Amy's New Activity Lunchbox Is Confused About + Mailbag: Listener Wants To Leave Her Job But Their Friend Is The Boss
description:
It's that time of the month...Find out who we crown the Employee Of The Month. Plus, Amy has started a new activity for a big project she has coming up! But Lunchbox is confused why she has started doing this and doesn't feel it's necessary. Mailbag: A listener wrote in saying she wants to leave her job, but her friend is the boss, and she doesn't want to burden her. We give her advice on what she should do.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
